review: Product seems like it is a good product. I contacted the Roku company prior to my purchase to make sure this was what I needed to solve my issue. After my purchase I discovered that I was mislead on several issues. I had numerous 24/7 Chat Window chats with Official Roku Techs, and was given evasive and inaccurate information. I had to make phone calls to Roku, email Roku, have live chats, and also contact the Marketplace seller before I finally returned the streaming stick. My issue was the tech support. They like to promote and sell their product but their customer support was lacking. I kept being faced with the online requirement of setting up an account and submitting my personal financial information BEFORE Roku would agree to activate the streaming stick. If you refuse to set up an online account, then they refuse to activate their product. That allows them to charge your card at will for services and products. I didn't like their terms, the tech support was insufficient and the product seemed problematic (it was a refurb) the whole process was difficult, so I contacted Amazon and asked for a full refund, which I received. An electronic product is only as good as the tech support. The Marketplace Seller was okay.
author: A. Johnson "Mrs. J"
